positive: Positive observation 1 (e.g., 'Patient name correctly extracted: John Doe')
Add as many positive observations as relevant...

negative.issue: Description of critical issue (e.g., 'Goals completely missing from structured data despite being discussed in case')
Description of high severity issue (e.g., 'Sex incorrect. Expected Male, got yMale')
Description of moderate issue (e.g., 'Gender identity truncated. Expected Non-binary, got non')
Description of low severity issue (e.g., 'Minor formatting inconsistency in medication list')
